🗺️ Source Data:

📈 Report: This report calculates the total value of each feature within the plan. This value is divided by the total value of each feature to obtain the % contained within the plan. If the plan includes multiple areas that overlap, the overlap is only counted once.
Bioregions 1: This report summarizes this plan's overlap with California's bioregions.

SizeCard - introduction: Californian state waters extend from the shoreline out to 12 nautical miles. This report summarizes plan overlap with state waters and measures progress towards 30x30 marine protection.
SizeCard - learn more:
<0> This report summarizes the size and proportion of this plan within these boundaries.

If sketch boundaries within a plan overlap with each other, the overlap is only counted once.
